error.message: Cannot open database "LittleBanking" requested by the login. The login failed. Login failed for user 'LittleBankingUser'.
error.detail:
System.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'LittleBanking.Public.PublicController'. Make sure that the controller has a parameterless public constructor. ---> Autofac.Core.DependencyResolutionException: An exception was thrown while executing a resolve operation. See the InnerException for details. ---> FluentNHibernate.Cfg.FluentConfigurationException: An invalid or incomplete configuration was used while creating a SessionFactory. Check PotentialReasons collection, and InnerException for more detail.
